Articles.Content:
Awesome as usual.

Let's hope the refueler has no problems.

Loving your mini 4th wall buster! Can't wait for Dres exploration!

*Determination.

37 minutes ago, KerbalOmmex said:

Awesome as usual.

Let's hope the refueler has no problems.

Shouldn't. Hopefully. Although there probably will be a launch delay because Gene makes Val go move to rover.  

27 minutes ago, SpaceplaneAddict said:

Loving your mini 4th wall buster! Can't wait for Dres exploration!

*Determination.

Yep! Determination is right! It's so annoying I keep running out of fuel! Does anyone test this stuff?!? Oh wait... Oh...

Ok, no chapter today, but tomorrow's chapter will have two more craft to name, plus even bigger rockets and the introduction of the rocket rover thing. Also, the next cruiser will be out the vab roof!

And... Uhhhh... Yeah... That's all I have to say...
Whale then, it must bee as pig as a whale!

Chapter 4.5-setting the goal. 

Intern bursts into mission control and runs up to Gene. 

Intern: Did you hear the news?!? Today @ShadowZone's space program broke a record when they sent their gargantua to Dres! 

Gene: WHAT?!? WHAT RECORD?!? 

Intern: Largest ship to orbit Dres! 

Gene: WE HAVE TO DO SOMETHING!!! WE WILL NOT BE BEATEN!!! 

3 minutes of planning later... 

Gene: Tell Walt to get the reporters here! Now! 

Other guy 1: Yes sir! 

At the speech place thing... 

Reporters: hey! Why are we here? Is it about Dres? I heard ShadowZone broke a record! Why did the intern mention someone on the third line? 

Gene: Be quite! 

Gene: There have been may firsts. First to sail around the world. First to fly. First to reach space. First to orbit. First to land on the mun. Then there were records. Second to land on the mun. Largest rocket, smallest eve return vehicle. But today, ShadowZone has made a new record, largest craft to orbit Dres. And we will not stand for that. We will set new records now, and by the end of summer, we will have completed it.

WE WILL SET THE RECORD FOR THE LARGEST CRAFT TO LAND ON DRES, AND NOTHING WILL STAND IN OUR WAY!!! Well, except lag, I guess. But you get the idea. 

*Reporters furiously scribbling down notes* 

Gene: WE WILL DO IT!!! WE SHALL BECOME RECORD BREAKERS!!! 

-Gene Kerman, 9:50 PM, US west coast time.

I recommend installing UbioZur Welding and TweakScale.

It will slay the lag and save your CPU from melting.

12 hours ago, KerbalOmmex said:

I recommend installing UbioZur Welding and TweakScale.

It will slay the lag and save your CPU from melting.

It's not that big. It's only a little smaller than @Kuzzter's intrepid.

I have much bigger ones too though. They can't land, and they won't be record breakers, but I am considering doing submit a payload kind of thing. 

And I play all stock.

Ok, today was lots of testing. And now, collusus will fly to Dres! Tomorrow will be chapter 5... And because you guys like it when I give you a sneak peek, here it is: 

Yes, it can get to orbit without alt-f12. Actually has a decent T/W ratio. I ran it for 30 minutes on physical time warp and it didn't run out of fuel. Begin the payload submitting tomorrow! Right after I figure out how to put them in ksp.

If you want to put the payloads in yiur game, go to KSP_win/Saves/(The nane of your save)/Ships/VAB and save the .craft file there. Easily done!

Also I have a Mün lander on KerbalX that can land on all planets except Kerbin, Tylo, Eve, Jool and Kerbol and Duna. It's tiny and has 2 km/s of Delta-V. I'm pretty sure you can fit one in your cruiser.

Edited May 30, 2016 by KerbalOmmex

23 hours ago, KerbalOmmex said:

Also I have a Mün lander on KerbalX that can land on all planets except Kerbin, Tylo, Eve, Jool and Kerbol and Duna. It's tiny and has 2 km/s of Delta-V. I'm pretty sure you can fit one in your cruiser.

If it can fit in an mk3 cargo bay CRG-50, and has both forward and rear mounting points, it can go to Dres.

Submissions for stuff to go to Dres are now open! Please just PM me. 

Also, here is the launch! 

Chapter 5-I think I can I think I can... REVERT TO VAB!!! (Yes that's it's name!)

Gene: ok, Jonrod, we added more struts after that uhh... RUD, in test #5! 

Jonrod: So I won't explode? 

Gene: ehhh... You might... 

Jonrod: Ok! T Z Space 

Val: Oh, hey, Gene- 

Gene: Did you forget to move the rover? 

Val: No, but- 

Gene: good! 

Val: But I was messing around with cheats, and it may have drifted away when I was flying that TIE fighter... 

Gene: *facepalm* 

Jonrod: AHHHHHHHHHHH!!! 

Bill: ok, for all you readers submitting crafts, this is the main bay where they will go. The secondary bay is behind this, but that stores to ships to KerbalOmmex landers.

Yep! That's right! It uses to same landers as the SkySlasher, except these ones are upgraded so that they can return to kerbin from low Dres orbit! 

And we are accepting craft so- 

Walt: that's an awfully big text block. I don't really think the readers will like that. 

Bill: oh, whoops! 

Jonrod: Guys stop arguing! I'm trying to go to space today! 

Bobak: booster separation. 

Bobak: Beginning gravity turn. 

Bobak: 2nd Stage separation. 

Bob: look at the mun! I wonder how Dangela is doing up there? 

Dangela over radio: AHHHHHHHHHHH!!! 

Bob: I guess not so well... 

Some random mission control dude: Hey guys were falling back into the atmosphere!!! 

Gene: revert to SPH? 

Walt: yes. 

Jonrod: I got to go to space today, so I'm happy. Do it. 

Gus: hey guys, maybe that wasn't a good idea, BECAUSE YOU BROKE THE SPH FLOOR!!! 

Gene: oops. 

End of chapter 5! 

Remeber to submit stuff! And wensday is my B-Day!
My mum lander can fit in a 1.75 m bay, so you could use them as test probes. It's only 900 kilos!

On May 31, 2016 at 0:32 AM, KerbalOmmex said:

My mum lander can fit in a 1.75 m bay, so you could use them as test probes. It's only 900 kilos!

Sure! 

I just got a new mouse, so expect a chapter tomorrow! I'm thinking of using the liquid fuel and oxidizer in the SkySlasher to refuel and redirect the KerbalOmmex to the Watney or diamond tug 1, then send both of them to Dres! Then maybe collusus IV will go to Dres. Maybe. But too many spoilers for now! 

Also, I'm still accepting submissions! Please? Anyone?
Hey, I'm kinda a trajectory geek...if you wanted to, would it be possible to use a gravity assist (from Eve, Kerbin, or Duna)? If you don't want to, it's also fine.

1 hour ago, Interplanet Janet said:

Hey, I'm kinda a trajectory geek...if you wanted to, would it be possible to use a gravity assist (from Eve, Kerbin, or Duna)? If you don't want to, it's also fine.

I just eyeball it, then just turn all engines on and sit there with a book because anything bigger than a Watney won't tolerate more than 2x physics warp. Not really anything special, except the lag. I just tested the collusus V, which is the largest collusus yet, to test my new mouse (B-Day present!) and 1.1's speed.

12.5 FPS!!! 

And the mouse works, so yeah. New chapter soon!
Oh, I see.

On June 2, 2016 at 7:05 AM, Interplanet Janet said:

Oh, I see.

Well... 

Spoiler

Maybe the ship taking that class C I found orbiting Kerbin might see some weird trajectorys. But, Spoilers! 

It's here: 

chapter 6-Random stuff (no really!) 

Gus: We have it rolled out on the pad. The random class cruiser! 

Mort: And by stealing important stuff borrowing from other ships, it costs less! 

Bill: also, to the random reader who designed this: I couldn't figure out how to put the engines in cargo ramps and plus Jeb isn't on this rocket: 

All 3 Crew: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!! 

Gene: but nobody on it is a Bad-S either. 

Jonrod: I can fly this: 

Crisdrien: But you can't fly a Kerbal 2! 

Jonrod: What do you know about piloting you annoying scientist? 

Crisdrien: Hey! 

Gene: You are a scientist though. 

Jonrod: See? Ha ha! 

Crisdrien: Hey what does this big red button with the word "SPACE" do? 

Jonrod, Gene, And the entire mission control: NO!!! WAIT- 

Gene: you can't even keep your crew under control... 

Crisdrien: Uh oh! TURN THE RCS ON!!! 

Jonrod: Hey Allan, what an you concerned about? 

Allan: Max kinda wants me to go eva. Like, right now. 

Jeb: JUMP OUT THE AIRLOCK!!! 

Gene: no. Mort wouldn't like loosing you and all those funds. 

Jonrod: see? Scientist. 

Crisdrien: wait is that thingy up there saying the lights are on, or that an airhorn is about to go off? 

Allan: PLUG YOUR EARS!!! 

Jonrod: we don't have any. 

Jonrod: only one gee? That means we're not accelerating very much! 

Jonrod: Move your head! 

Crisdrien: I CAN'T MOVE THE IVA PORTRAIT!!! 

The entire crew: AHH!!! We're flipping! 

The entire crew: ooo!!! Shiny!!!

Bobak: Firing second stage, activating LV-N's! 

Crisdrien: look maneuver node! Quick! 

Jonrod: how do expect me to do that when you're yelling?!? 

Jonrod: that wasn't actually too bad. 

Bobak: radiators deployed. 

Gene: shut down the nukes. 

Bobak: yes sir! LV-N's off, radiators retracted. 

Crisdrien: Looks pretty.

Jonrod: so very sciency. 

Gerty: Crew report in the middle of a circulation burn recorded as "looks pretty." 

Gene: *faceplam* 

Linus: well, we did actually get science from that! 

Bobak: High five dude! 

Bobak: Shielded port open, bay open, stable orbit reached. 

Gene: WOO HOO!!! 

Jonrod: Permission to hopefully go to Dres next chapter and stuff? 

Gene: permission granted. 

End of chapter 6! 

Thanks to all the readers and stuff! Especially that random reader who I really hope is reading this right now!
hi!
Jondrod, Chrisden and Allan look like they have lots of stupidity.

1 minute ago, KerbalOmmex said:

Jondrod, Chrisden and Allan look like they have lots of stupidity.

Jonrod is really stupid and isn't very courageous, in the middle of both stupidity and courage are Chrisdren and Allan. Allan is more stupid, Chrisdien is just a little more courageous than Allan. I haven't seen you in a week!

5 hours ago, max_creative said:

I haven't seen you in a week!

Yep. Got a fever of 102 F. But now I'm well.

But who's Gerty Kerman, I don't remember her(?).

6 hours ago, KerbalOmmex said:

But who's Gerty Kerman, I don't remember her(?).

Gerty is the computer in The Kron series. (Not mine) I just used Gerty because I felt like adding another random character because I was kinda bored.

6 hours ago, max_creative said:

Gerty is the computer in The Kron series. (Not mine) I just used Gerty because I felt like adding another random character because I was kinda bored.

Wait, sorry, Kerty was The Kron 3 computer. Gerty is similar to Kerty (supposedly), but Gerty is the computer for all ships here, while Kerty was just the Kron 3. I chose Gerty because it sounded similar to Kerty. Also, I don't have that Iva thingy mod, so don't expect to see Gerty in game.

Today, we begin to send stuff to Dres... 

Chapter 7-We Will Go To Dres Today Soon! 

Jonrod: Gerty, plot me a low Delta-V trajectory to Kerbin escape. 

Gerty: Got it! 

Jonrod: Thunbs up for leaving the third stage on! 

Gerty: our target is the mun, to do a gravity assist. 

Bobak: here is the map view. That asteroid is the class C max_creative mentioned in the spoiler at the top of chapter 5. 

Jonrod: dumping third stage! Man that thing hates physical time warp! 

Gene: kill the engines. Bobak is currently plotting a new maneuver. 

Jonrod: yes sir! *presses X key* 

Bobak: here is your new burn. 3 Minutes is the longest these engines have ever burned, so this will be a good test for the radiators and endurance. 

Jonrod: 2 minutes 38 seconds left. Wow. Long burn. 

Gerty: Actually, your Dres capture burn will be even longer. 

Crew: AHHHHHHHHHHHH!!! 

Gene: Great job Gerty, great job... 

Jonrod: It can take 4x physical warp, because of no thrust vectoring and lots of struts. *thumbs up* 

Allan: Mission control, we are going to Dres. Prepare the 3 Weirdness and stuff class cruisers! 

Gene: Got it! 

Gus: Rolling out Weirdness #1 now... 

End of chapter 7! 

I wonder who will guess first what the Weirdness and Stuff class Cruiser is named after...
Weirdness and Stuff class cruisers? What's next @max_creative, It's-too-laggy class cruisers?
